name: .help
vignettes: Show the list of command-line options of \crace-plot

name: execDir
description: Directory where the programs will be run.

name: numRepetitions
description: The number of repetitions of the Crace results.
vignettes: The number of repetitions of \Crace results. This option is only availiable when \parameter{execDir} is not None. When \parameter{execDir} is not None, this option should be lager than 1. The default value of this parameter is 1.

name: outDir
description: Directory where the output files will be.

name: title
description: The title of the output plot.
vignettes: The title of the output plot. The default value of this option depends on the \parameter{execDir} and the \parameter{drawMethod}. This option is only avaliable when \parameter{execDir} and \parameter{drawMethod} are not None.

name: fileName
description: The name of the output plot file.
vignettes: The name of the output plot file. The default value of this option is 'plot.png'. This option is only avaliable when \parameter{execDir} and \parameter{drawMethod} are not None.

name: drawMethod
domain: (boxplot, violinplot, parallelcoord, parallelcat, piechart, scattermatrix, histplot, jointplot)
description: The method chose to draw a plot for the Crace results.
vignettes:
The funtion chose to analyse the \Crace results. If this option is not null, \execDir must to be provided.
 When one method is chosen, the correspoding option must be True.

name: dataFrom
description: The origin of data used for drawing plot(s).
vignettes:
What type of the data used for drawing plot(s), which includes the quality of configurations from experiment(s), 
the parameters of configuration(s) from one experiment and the quality of configurations from one experiment.

name: numConfigurations
description: The number of configurations used to draw plot.

name: elseNumConfigs
description: Additional parameter for the number of configurations when 'else' is chosed for numConfigurations.
vignettes: Additional parameter for the number of configurations when 'else' is chosed for \parameter{numConfigurations}.

name: configType
description: The type of configurations from provided Crace results.

name: keyParameter
description: The parameter chosed to be the key in the plot.
vignettes: The parameter chosed to be the key one shown in the plot. For example: if one parameter is provided as the key for the parallelplot, the plot will be grouped by this parameter.

name: multiParameters
description: Multiple parameters provided to draw plot like scatter matrix.
vignettes: Multiple parameters provided to draw plot like scatter matrix on the provided Crace results.

name: dpi
description: The parameter dpi used for saving plot.
vignettes: When method used to draw a plot will export a plot file, this parameter will be added to control the quality of the exported plot.
